data.title: Hear Billy Joel Classics In A New Way Performed By Notable Names On Broadway
data.meta_description: Snag tickets to Broadway Sings Billy Joel, happening for a limited time at the Cutting Room. Catch the show on March 16, June 16th and 23rd!
data.text:
Get into a “New York State of Mind” with a new version of notable tunes from hometown music icon, Billy Joel! On select dates in March and June, Broadway Sings Billy Joel will take place at The Cutting Room (44 E. 32nd st).

Two shows take place on March 16, June 16th and 23rd at fans can listen to a modern twist on notable Billy Joel favorites! Just a few among the lengthy setlist include “She’s Got a Way,” “Piano Man” and “New York State of Mind.” There are too many hits to name that is part of Joel’s deep discography.

Get tickets to the limited concert series Broadway Sings Billy Joel!

Hailing from Long Island, Joel’s deep roots in New York and homage to the city in his songs provide a soundtrack for many born and bred here. He’s set to play his 150th and final show at Madison Square Garden to mark the end of his residency on July 25th! You can celebrate Joel’s legacy ahead of his final show, and enjoy some of the best theater voices paying homage to this legend.

Broadway Sings is a concert series featuring Broadway vocalists who reimagine songs from some of the most influential contemporary artists. Some notable names theater geeks might know, include Charlie Franklin (Book of Mormon), Kyle Taylor Parker (Kinky Boots), Zak Resnick (Mamma Mia!), Keri René Fuller (Six) and Emily Kristen Morris (Wicked) among many other performers. These talented vocalists will be backed by a full 14-piece orchestra to make for an extra special concert for fans!

Tickets range from $35-$65 depending on your spot. Balcony tickets are $35 and Bar room tickets are $50. Main room tickets are the best seat in the house and go for $65 per person.
